channel.title: Delete Items From Invy?

item.title: Delete Items From Invy?
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

I am using a devolution 7.0 server source and i am currently making full wokring barrows. I want to make it so barrows drop keys and to enter the tunnel you need all 6 keys. But when you enter the crypt i want it to rmeove the items and this isnâ€™t working:

if (objectID == 6726) { if (playerHasItem(300)) if (playerHasItem(300)) if (playerHasItem(300)) if (playerHasItem(300)) if (playerHasItem(300)) { deleteItem(300); deleteItem(300); deleteItem(300); deleteItem(300); deleteItem(300); teleportToX = 3535; teleportToY = 9700; } else { sendMessage("You need 5 rat tails to enter!"); } }

Read full topic
